scripts.testsprite: start /B cmd /C "node scripts/dev-server.cjs > nul 2>&1 &" && timeout /T 2 > nul && playwright test --reporter=list
scripts.testsprite:headed: start /B cmd /C "node scripts/dev-server.cjs > nul 2>&1 &" && timeout /T 2 > nul && playwright test --headed
scripts.testsprite:ci: node scripts/dev-server.cjs & npx wait-on http://localhost:5173 && playwright test --reporter=dot
